price: 37. Ir ženklas jiems yra naktis. Mes paimame iš jos dieną, iš štai, jie tamsoje.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu al-nahāra fa-idhā hum muẓ'limūna
